text: Heads of Police from nearly 190 countries will take part in the Conference. IGP Jayasundara is to hold special discussions with his counterparts from Australia, Indonesia, and Police.During his absence in the country, Senior DIG (Administration) C.D. Wickremerathne will be the Acting IGP.Inspector General of Police Pujith Jayasundara left for Bali, Indonesia to participate at the 85th International al Police Conference to be held from today (7th Nov.) to 10th November.
title: IGP left for Intl Police Conference
